data.title: VIS Entertainment Axes London Studio
data.meta_description:
War of the Whiskers and Relish Rampage creator VIS entertainment announced today that it has closed its London studio (acquired from BAM! Entertainment in April) because of frequent delays and cancellations involving its software.

Chris van der Kuyl, president and CEO, of VIS Entertainment announced the closure in a statement saying "A series of delays and cancellations to the studio's forthcoming projects have forced this decision upon the VIS management team. The studio will close upon completion of its current works in progress."
data.text:
War of the Whiskers

and Relish Rampage creator VIS entertainment announced today that it has closed its London studio (acquired from BAM! Entertainment in April) because of frequent delays and cancellations involving its software.

Chris van der Kuyl, president and CEO, of VIS Entertainment announced the closure in a statement saying "A series of delays and cancellations to the studio's forthcoming projects have forced this decision upon the VIS management team. The studio will close upon completion of its current works in progress."

VIS hopes to retain the majority of its London staff by adding them to its other studios based in Dundee and Edinburgh. Special thanks go out to Indie for the info.
